name: svelte-sitemap
description: Small helper which scans your Svelte routes folder and generates static sitemap.xml
author: BART! <bart@bartweb.cz>

scripts.test:outdir: yarn outdir:prepare && OUT_DIR='public' yarn test && yarn outdir:revert
scripts.publish:next: yarn && yarn build && yarn test && cd dist && npm publish --tag next
scripts.publish:beta: yarn && yarn build && yarn test && cd dist && npm publish --tag beta
scripts.release:patch: git checkout master && npm version patch -m "chore(update): patch release %s ðŸ› "
scripts.release:minor: git checkout master && npm version minor -m "chore(update): release %s ðŸš€"
scripts.release:major: git checkout master && npm version major -m "chore(update): major release %s ðŸ’¥ "
